page.title: 02HOME LIFE
page.content: MY NAME IS MELISSA. I AM 9 YEARS OLD.I LIVE IN TUDBURY RD NORTHFIELD WITH MY MUMMY,DADDY & SISTER.WE ALSO HAVE GERBILS,DOGS,TADPOLES,FISH & CATS.OUR HOUSE IS SEMI-DETACHED.IT HAS 3 BEDROOMS A LOO,A KITCHEN,A LIVING ROOM & 2 HALLS.MY DADDY WORKS AT PEBBLE MILL. HE IS ON SHIFTS. MY MUMMY IS A CHILD-MINDER AT HOME.MY SISTER GOES TO SCHOOL.SHE IS 5 YEARS OLD.SHE IS IN THE INFANTS BUT I AM IN THE JUNIORS.AT HOME DURING OUR SPARE TIME WE ALL ENJOY OUR HOBBIES.MY DAD LIKES GARDENING,KEEPING THE HOUSE CLEAN,WALKING AND READING.MY MUMMY LIKES READING,LOOKING AFTER ANIMALS AND OUR CARAVAN AND SHE ENJOYS WASHING OUR MINI-BUS.MY DADDY IS A STUDIO ATTENDANT AT PEBBLE MILL.WE ALL LIKE SHOPPNG,EATING AT MCDONALD'S,TRIPS TO THE SEASIDE,AND VISITING NAN AND GRANDAD.MY AUNT VISITS US OFTEN . DOES GARDENING,KEEPOHOME }MNDER AT
